item.title: How to install Ubuntu bash on windows
item.description: Microsoft announced at Build 2016 , about the new feature to run native Bash and GNU/Linux command-line tools Gabriel Aul has just announced the release of the Windows 10 build #14316 to the Windows Insiders Fast-Ring This build contains the first public release of Bash on Ubuntu on Windows and the underlying Windows Subsystem for Linux. Turn on Developer Mode: Settings | Update & Security | For Developers | Check the Developer Mode radio button:
